verses.verse: Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H4427>reigneth<s%>; Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>; Let the <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H339>isles<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%>.
Clouds <S%H6051><s%> and <S%H6205>darkness<s%> are round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H6664>him<s%>: Righteousness and <S%H4941>justice<s%> are the <S%H4349>foundation<s%> of his <S%H3678>throne<s%>.
A <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H3212>goeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3857>him<s%>, And burneth up his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H4549>melted<s%> like <S%H1749>wax<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, At the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, And all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

Let all them be put to <S%H954>shame<s%> that <S%H5647>serve<s%> graven <S%H6459>images<s%>, That <S%H1984>boast<s%> themselves of <S%H457>idols<s%>: <S%H7812>Worship<s%> <S%H430>him<s%>, all ye gods.

Zion <S%H6726><s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> and was <S%H8055>glad<s%>, And the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1523>rejoiced<s%>, Because of thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
For <S%H3068>thou<s%>, Jehovah, art most high <S%H5945>above<s%> all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: Thou art <S%H5927>exalted<s%> far <S%H3966>above<s%> all <S%H430>gods<s%>.

O ye that <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: He <S%H8104>preserveth<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of his <S%H2623>saints<s%>; He <S%H5337>delivereth<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
Light <S%H216><s%> is <S%H2232>sown<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, And <S%H8057>gladness<s%> for the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, ye <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; And give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to his <S%H6944>holy<s%> memorial <S%H2143>name<s%>.
